mapper.select: SELECT c1.title AS tit1, c2.title AS tit2 FROM `km_cate1` AS c1 JOIN `km_cate2` AS c2 ON c1.code1 = c2.code1 WHERE c1.code1=#{cate1} AND c2.code2=#{cate2};

SELECT a.*, b.title AS tit1, c.title AS tit2, Floor(price * (1 - discount/100)) AS `salePrice` FROM `km_product` AS a JOIN `km_cate1` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.code1 JOIN `km_cate2` AS c ON a.cate1 = c.code1 AND a.cate2 = c.code2 WHERE `code`=#{code};
